tool_description: Collects and aggregates ratings from multiple sources for specified books, providing unified rating metrics.

book_ids.description: Array of book IDs to aggregate ratings for

aggregation_method.description: Method to aggregate ratings: simple_average, weighted_average, or median

weight_by_reviews.description: Whether to weight ratings by number of reviews

min_reviews_threshold.description: Minimum reviews required for a source to be included

include_source_breakdown.description: Whether to include per-source rating details

cache_duration_hours.description: How long to cache rating data in hours (1-168)

error_messages: Empty book_ids array: Provide at least one book ID for rating aggregation.
Invalid rating source: One or more rating sources are not supported.
Invalid aggregation method: Use one of [simple_average, weighted_average, median].
Invalid cache duration: Must be between 1 and 168 hours.
Rating data unavailable: Unable to retrieve sufficient rating data for the specified books.
API rate limit exceeded: Too many rating requests, try again later.
usage: Provide book_ids array and optionally configure rating sources and aggregation method. The tool will collect ratings from multiple sources and provide unified metrics. Use caching to improve performance for repeated requests.

aggregated_ratings.description: Array of book ratings with aggregated scores

source_coverage.description: Which sources provided data for each book

average_confidence.description: Confidence score for the aggregated ratings (0.0-1.0)

total_reviews.description: Total number of reviews across all sources

data_freshness.description: Timestamp of when rating data was last updated
